channel.title: Comments on: The Daily WTF
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: arielcohen
item.dc:creator: arielcohen
item.description: I got to admit that now I log regularly to WTF, and the shit going there is really funny... Have you seen the pop-ups from Sep 2nd? I can't stop laughing.
item.content:encoded: I got to admit that now I log regularly to WTF, and the shit going there is really funny… Have you seen the pop-ups from Sep 2nd? I can’t stop laughing.

item.title: By: arielcohen
item.dc:creator: arielcohen
item.description: hmmm, so I guess you are not in jail.... next time I will look at the date before I write a reply... Man, I had no intension to piss you off when I wrote few days ago that I hope you will not talk about programming all the time. You shouldn't completely ignore programming in your blog...
item.content:encoded:
hmmm, so I guess you are not in jail…. next time I will look at the date before I write a reply…
Man, I had no intension to piss you off when I wrote few days ago that I hope you will not talk about programming all the time. You shouldn’t completely ignore programming in your blog…
